ygData.subject: Quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to make sure: Area effect songs affect people in your group too in PVP situations? If you re grouped with people and get jumped by some others, Lament
ygData.messageBody:
Just to make sure: Area effect songs affect people in your group too in PVP
situations? If you're grouped with people and get jumped by some others,
Lament would work on your group too?

Btw, how does something like Lullaby or Lament affect other players? Is it
sort of like being charmed for a bit? Or do they not work well on players
at all?

No idea what you could solo, sorry. And congrats for reaching that level on
Rallos! Have any stories of how your songs helped in pvp situations? ;)

Dud (the bloodthirsty).

-----Original Message-----
From: Karen [SMTP:ka-@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 8:56 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Soloing

<< File: ATT00002.htm >> Hey all!
I am a level 28 bard on the Rallos Zek server. I play some odd hours, wake
up in the middle of the night and need my EQ fix etc. : ) I would love
input into what I could possibly solo at my level. I use a demon claw and
a tomahawk as weapons, and seem to use bellow alot in fights. Also keep in
mind that since I am on PvP I can not use all songs the same way other
bards do. If anyone is around my non-party spells effect them and I hate
to go around putting everyone to sleep all the time.

Thanks,
Infiniti
